summary: The module implements the core functionality for analyzing Bitbucket Pipelines configuration files. It defines a reusable abstract base for individual checks and provides a runner that parses pipeline definitions, loads relevant check registries, validates file types, and executes external security and compliance checks.
business_intent: To automate the detection of security and compliance issues in Bitbucket Pipelines CI/CD configurations, allowing users to enforce bestâ€‘practice policies and prevent misconfigurations before code is executed.
